messages.title: My Priorities for Poplar and Limehouse

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Poplar and Limehouse contains many of the fastest growing areas in London from Wapping Dock to Poplar to the Isle of Dogs. I will work with the Conservative government to ensure we get our fair share of new infrastructure money.

As I go around I see everywhere the small silver canisters containing NOX gas that young people inhale. If elected as your MP I will work with the Conservative government to give the Police more powers to stop this abuse.

If you have lived in your Council home for a long time you should be able to continue to buy it. I will also work with the Conservative government to make sure we get a fair share of government grants to help build more new social housing in Poplar and Limehouse.
